descriptionHtml:
This was my first mod.
Its a heavy armour based on the ancient Nordic armor altered with a custom texture and mesh to look like it is made from the flesh and bones of your fallen foes. Female armor is unp compatible.
Gauntlets are based  on the dark brotherhoods gloves retextured one red and the other green (like argonian skin).
I also made Spiked brass knuckles that take the place of a ring.
The boots are a retexture of the storm cloak spiked boots with skull knee guards.
the Helm Is the ancient nord with a skull, horns and a red and black crest.
The heavy spiked shield is a custom mesh and texture with a more immersive grip location and a forearm band so the shield is actually strapped to your arm.
the set includes a sword based on the imperial with custom textures and animations, and a bone bow with matching arrows.
I also added two craftable gem skulls with properties like azuras star, one absorbs black souls and the other white souls.
everything is craftable and upgradeable.


Many thanks to:
                      Exeter -  UNP Female Armors
                      PanTast - Ancient Nord Chainmail Texture
                      Silverfeet - Bloodlust Bow Meshes
                      NPR legging meshes - R18Pn 06 - Diano Armor
                      CuteUnit - Ebonmourne - The Most Overly Fancy Sword Ever
author: Sandaf
